website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Xperia XA is a good-looking unlocked Android phone, but it's too expensive for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone at Christmas by may it wasnt working. The on/off button stopped working completely by this time. Prior to this screen would flicker like crazy. Asked the seller if I could return it for a replacement as this wasnt really acceptable and was only offered a £10 refund as a "good will gesture". After contacting Amazon about the issue and they gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and giving it 4 stars only because like it's predecessor (Xperia XA F3111 bought 2016) its battery usage is a bit excessive. It arrived on time and no faults and set up using Xperia Companion and Google was quite painless. The Camera is excellent but will not be using the earphones that came with as my Sony clip ones I bought with the first one are superior [they stay on my ears and don't fall out.] Overall great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Graham L. Empson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend this phone at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son his old phone which he had for years finally gave up but wasn’t going to spend ££££ on the latest phones. This phone is ok however the battery is rubbish it even dies when turned off. When setting up be aware the phone is set up in Spanish so had to translate to set up in English and you will have to change the keyboard, time settings etc which was a bit of a faff. It’s not a bad phone but there’s better for the same price. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Campbell beattie

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy uk phone
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of problems with this phone it was set up for italy (TIM) and took me while to sort the phone out. Amazon was helpful when did not know where to go. I happy with the phone but don't think I buy again through Amazon. I have not used the camera so I cannot comment.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great device but......
customer_reviews.text: As a mobile device it's great...as a phone its unreliable. Constantly misses calls ..showing them later as missed calls but not ringing in true time! I'm sure this is not indicative of this model as I've had two previously and they have been fine...this is the first one I've bought from Amazon, the others were from a high street outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Response aerial systems

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Great phone had it now for 6weeks and no problems. Giving a 5stars due to arrived on time and no faults, previously owned HTC One M8 which was a great phone till started having problems after 2years. This phone works as good and is alot cheaper, only thing I think would be better is the audio volume could be higher but quality is good, overall great phone for the price.

customer_reviews.title: A good all round phone
customer_reviews.text: A good all round phone, can be a bit sensitive on the touch screen. I find it more user friendly than my old moto g 3, and cheaper. I am using more of the apps as they seem simpler for some one like me who is over 60.
customer_reviews.author: woz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish. Within months (4 only) the battery became a joke. l have written to the seller and they happily ignored me. Stay clear .
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Broken and unusable after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months old and the whole phone has frozen. System UI keeps stopping. Bluetooth share constantly turns on and off automatically. Can't use it for anything. I've performed all the actions suggested by fixes eg clear cache, force stop, uninstall etc and I've had my IT friend look at it, but its bust. Fit only for the bin. Gutted. Was great while it worked!
customer_reviews.author: beccy w.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I've had an Experia XA1 for 4yrs and it still works as new. So when my wife needed a replacement the XA has been an great choice. A nice size and reasonable performance - ideal for what we need. OK not a top flight model, but just what we want. 5* phone against our needs.
customer_reviews.author: D.Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Bought the phone for my daughter and she loved it. To me
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone for my daughter and she loved it. To me, the phone looks nice, orks great, runs all the apps she needs to run and the battery lasts way more than her previous phone. Happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo J.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone by Sony, Fantastic service from Amazon. Really, really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty!
customer_reviews.text: All works fine APART from the fact no one can hear me or me hear them. It's a fault with the phone but I didn't realise until later so seller did not respond to my request to return it. Complete waste of money. These phones are faulty!
customer_reviews.author: NickC

customer_reviews.title: Good value and only a few minor issues..
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying pretty much everything about this phone I'm just not a big fan of the big space at the bottom... Surely the 'home' + 'back' buttons should be here. The camera is better than I'm used to and Xperia data transfer is very cool 😎 I can't get the phone to connect to my laptop however...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received really quickly easy to set up and my daughter loves it defo recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J bangura

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Well considering I have not received my delivery for no reason at all! I'm going to say absolute rubbish! I had to put one star or I could not put my review up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered fast, product as described. Bought to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast, product as described. Bought to put away for Xmas for my son, I've had a Sony after having had a Samsung and personally prefer them.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The battery is crap
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good, camara okay but the battery...It can last one day if you don't use the phone and put the battery saving on. Good if you are happy to use a portable charger all the time or used as landline
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bought for both daughters.
customer_reviews.text: The vibes I'm getting from both daughters are they are very pleased with the Xperia phones+screen protector+the cases are a handy and lovely complement to the mobiles thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sammyxx

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone ever.
customer_reviews.text: Do not get this phone! My friend also had this phone and we both constantly had issues. To long to write them all, but save yourself the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.W

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone to replace a previous one. After I installed a Sony update my phone screen would black out every now and then in the middle of doing something Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy another phone
customer_reviews.text: Cannot charge it in my car. This is ridiculous and it is a problem with all Xperia phones with older cars.
customer_reviews.author: Rory

customer_reviews.title: Good camera and fast enough procesor.  Price is good.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera and fast enough procesor. Price is good. Recommend for a friend. Down side is some installed programmes can not be deleted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Receiver was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. Receiver was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: June Fern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Partner loves this can't get it away from him. Fast delivery too
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: I do love this phone but the touch screen isn't very responsive ...
customer_reviews.text: I do love this phone but the touch screen isn't very responsive sometimes wich is frustrating. When the batterystarts to drop beneath 40% the response of the screen is even more delayed. It's really telling when the battery is struggling.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: ... requirements for something affordable but with spec of camera good enough to get prints from
customer_reviews.text: Matched my requirements for something affordable but with spec of camera good enough to get prints from, and slightly smaller than most smart phones available now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fogg

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: The phone seemed ok but on closer inspection the adapter plug had a pin broken so this item was returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: will be wary of buying phone online again
customer_reviews.text: kept freezing for the first month charger that came with it was crap would not charge phone had to buy new one
customer_reviews.author: trevor hoare

customer_reviews.title: Mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived quickly but not working properly. Wouldn't charge up. Also, plug on end of charger was a 2 pin, no apdoptor.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Great phone takes great pictures/videos such a shame about the battery life or lack of it! Although i am not a heavy user i still have to re-charge every day !!
customer_reviews.author: wolfie

customer_reviews.title: This phone screen came unstuck of its own accord making ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone screen came unstuck of its own accord making it unusable and even though it happen with warranty when sent for repair I was told I needed to pay a £100.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: Sony quality is present but battery life should be better
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it but battery life is not that great, otherwise a very decent mobile - looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great Sony phone for the price. I've bought 2. One for each of kids
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, but English instructions would have been useful
customer_reviews.text: All good, but the instructions did not include an English version.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift and I. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Limited space on phone meant soon ran out of space after Google updates
customer_reviews.author: B. Bitcheno

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone, It met almost all my expectations, the phone almost rival my iphone 6s plus, the graphic and sound quality is just what you would expect from a Sony product. I bought it for my wife and she really loved it and it came with all the relevant accessory contrary to one of the previous review I read. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. I had to cut my micro-sim to a nano-sim to make it fit, quite a technical job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam A

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Sony Xperia
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone ..it does everything i want it to do ..and it looks fab .....Could not ask for better ..And didnt break the bank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My phone is not working. Where do I send ...
customer_reviews.text: My phone is not working. Where do I send it to fix it? I bought it 3 months ago and does not charge well, instead of charging when it is charging, it draws the battery and the phone is very hot in the back part. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great price but battery life is a bit disappointing tbh !
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, very tactile, attractive and durable (with great features) - at a great price. My only gripe is the battery, looks like I'll need to charge this every day !
customer_reviews.author: Shell G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, It arrived early the next day in perfect condition, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean looking
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone. Easy to use and clean looking. Fab camera with excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: A C M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great purchase but it had no headphones included what was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and exactly what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Satoshi Ozeki

customer_reviews.title: smashed the glass... repair it is quite ...
customer_reviews.text: smashed the glass... repair it is quite a pain... you guys should be aware, it is not a spontaneous procedure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRAUD DO NOT BUY/ PHONE DOESNT WORK!! I HAVE BEEN BUMPED!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this phone for my younger brother and this phone has no network - I have inserted various Sim and yet no calls /messages go through. What a waste of my money!!! This is a fraud company!!! Very angry!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone is ok but the battery is not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touch not working after a power off on
customer_reviews.text: Touch pad stopped working all of a sudden, and not able to unlock pattern after a power cycle. Please advise the next steps. Screen has lot of stripes and is insensitive to key press, The product was purchased last month and totally disappointed... Thanks, Pramod
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed smartphone that Wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my dad for christmas that I bought on behalf of my mum. Dad is so pleased with this phone. As you can expect with Sony the quality of this phone is amazing. It has a really premium build quality and the screen looks amazing too. It comes with Android 6.0 which whilst not the lastest version it's recent enough to not really be any issue at all. Dad reports that the battery life on this is much better than other smartphones he's had in the past so that's a plus for this handset too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: but Sony have made data transfer easy - Xperia Transfer app installed on both phones (works ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgrade to my M4 which was running out of memory, Neither of them as reliable as the M2 predecessor, but Sony have made data transfer easy - Xperia Transfer app installed on both phones (works with iOS and other operating systems too) syncs the accounts, contacts and threads very quickly - the media took a bit longer but straight into your new phone same as the old. Doesn't have the front end muting options and the looks are a bit odd - like it's bent in the middle. Too much duplicate software from Sony again clogging up memory. Nice colour mind
customer_reviews.author: Richard Grenfell

customer_reviews.title: Overall very happy. Does everything you'd want in a smartphone for ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy. Does everything you'd want in a smartphone for an extremely acceptable price. Screen resolution great for watching videos/catch up TV and easy to use interface. A definite upgrade from my previous Samsung Galaxy S4. Only one question mark.. If you're looking for a phone to take pictures and film in abundance, probably have a look for alternatives as the quality could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie T

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and glitchy 😑
customer_reviews.text: Where to start.... Slow, clunky, glitchy. I bought this to replace the Samsung S5 I broke. The Samsung is way way better in every way. I've had this phone 4 weeks now and can't wait to swap it over again in 3 months time. Avoid like the plague or spend more money on an Xperia Z as they are the next step up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this device.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device last Christmas 2016. In the beguining everything was fine and phone worked perfectly. Now, 3 months later the screen goes mad, doing things on its own and no responding to any command. I thought it was a kind of malware but doing some online research looks like it is a Sony's software malfunction quite common in their Xperia range. It is funny that after such a short period of time I cannot return nor exchange my item with the seller. So, guys, here is my advise: DO NOT BUY any Sony device and mostly do not buy with this seller because if something happens you will loose your money. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Aitor G.

customer_reviews.title: The Wi-fi connection is very bad; when I move from my room and get ...
customer_reviews.text: The Wi-fi connection is very bad; when I move from my room and get back to it, the phone disconnects with wi-fi and I have to switch it off and then turn it on to reconnect to the internet, this hasn't happened with my previous phone. The battery drowns quickly. I wish if I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I have ever had. The touch screen is often unresponsive - and takes on a life of its own - the top right icon/option is often selected without command and the tab menu often scrolls down by itself. This makes the phone unusable, and there are cheaper phones that do not have these shameful flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good for a stop-gap phone
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely and seems really well made, but once you ask it to start running multiple processes and open new apps it's like using the 12-year-old Dell PC at the office that's still rocking Windows 98. Gets a bit torpid. Great option for a stop-gap if, for example, your Z3 Compact decided to throw a fit after 18 months and stopped functioning in half the ways it was designed to, forcing you to leave accidental voicemails every time someone doesn't pick up the phone. Come to think of it, I probably won't buy Sony phones again.
customer_reviews.author: Max Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Won't switch on, present and a nightmare trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't switch on , present and a nightmare trying to explain ,
customer_reviews.author: GARY MILLIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from Sony.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product, honestly cannot believe that it is only £149.99 (as opposed to a £700 iPhone)! Sleek design, easy to use interface, can sync it with my Google account and back-up my photos on Google and OneDrive. Memory only 16GB but can always add in an SD card if needed. I think this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: Great phone I've had it for a few months now, however It does freeze now and then and gets unusually hot whenever I use snapchat. The battery life on it isn't great either so I've bought myself a power bank for on the go. It is also unresponsive whenever a bit of water drops on the screen (like if its raining outside or have wet hands) Other than that I do like the phone but I think there are better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Carney

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Have had this phone for nearly two years now after buying it on its day of release. After around two years I am having some slight battery / button problems but phone fully works aside from that - a great phone that does everything I need it to. Would rather spend £200 on this than £500 on a better model which run basically the same
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money, camera is OK.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. And in every way. If you want to spend more on getting a better camera in your phone, do. This isn't the best in low light or taking pictures of documents.
customer_reviews.author: kinkorbit

customer_reviews.title: Camera specs completely wrong. Not a 23 mp nor a 13 mp selfie lens. Correction its a 13mp, 8mp
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Sony design, lack reasonable firmware. Not to mention this is false advertising, states this phone boasts a 23 mega pixel camera, and a 13 mp front facing camera, well the front facing camera is an 8mp, the back main camera is a 13mp. But for its price its definitely a worthy goof looking smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has been delighted with this phone thank-you. Quality service and product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms J R Gambell

customer_reviews.title: got this phone sometime ago and it was great the front and back camras are great high quality ...
customer_reviews.text: got this phone sometime ago and it was great the front and back camras are great high quality resaloution for a smartphone and the screen display is great to for watching youtube and playing games. the on slight negitive is the speakers they are good but not great was expecting better quality sound from a sony phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: The phone is like any other Android phone and Ok for my use as spare phone when travelling. However, the battery life is really poor
customer_reviews.author: bala

customer_reviews.title: Quality of course always with sony
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price, does what it says can't go wrong grandaughter screamed with joy, definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Slick phone for $
customer_reviews.text: love the phone........batery could do with a better 1 but 4 cash paid its a deal
customer_reviews.author: Darran Smith Llb

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This phone must be the best value phone for its era.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: easy to use smartphone
customer_reviews.text: i do not like my previous smart phones, but i get on well (so far) with this one. mixed with a sim only deal for £10 of 4mg 4g and high calls texts makes it good value.
customer_reviews.author: weeves

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish. Phone died on me and Sony made it ...
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Phone died on me and Sony made it so difficult to sort out that I did not receive a satisfactory conclusion despite still being in the guarantee period. I am now with Samsung and will never buy another Sony product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. D. Barratt

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Only deducted one star because the battery life is a day but this is universal with smartphones so can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Not the best sound and the screen isn't that responsive.
customer_reviews.author: dodds

customer_reviews.title: sony XA
customer_reviews.text: It's a Sony , It's a great product ,,,,Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, 6" but thin
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a change so went for the Sony XA. Nice phone, 6" but thin. Good camera but not the biggest mp. Still getting to know it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr R.S.Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and value for money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone and value for money. This phone is for my daughter who absolutely loves it. The only thing is that it doesn't come with any headphones.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone was fine but 6 months after purchase it now won't charge, which makes it pretty hopeless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but brush up on your Chinese!
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived pretty quickly and given the price this phone provides nice aesthetics, nice edge to edge (sides) display at 720p, slim/thin profile and is reasonably smooth/quick to use. The colour appears more lime green than gold IMO and the phone is a little taller than expected. Warning! the phone arrived with the display configured to Chinese language. A bit of research on the internet and eventually I found the keyboard settings which you can adjust to any language/text, No big deal but not sure why it is shipped this way when the phone is described as 'XA UK SIM free'?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholascrunchietwix

customer_reviews.title: Woeful battery life
customer_reviews.text: Feels quite cheap and nasty - which isn't surprising as it is cheap - but everything works OK. Camera takes decent pictures but the main problem is the battery life - just doing nothing (literally actually not using the phone) it only lasts 9 hours. If you start using it for browsing or calling etc, expect to get less than 5 hours. Makes this phone unusable.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Apps that you move to external memory goes back automatically to internal memory once updated. Swiping from top to bottom to display notifications is not an easy task. Media sound is very weak. You have to download an app to block unwanted calls Pros: Fast phone Super fast charger Slim size and light weight
customer_reviews.author: T. Allam

customer_reviews.title: camera / imaging no better, and sound isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as replacement to a Z3 compact. Pleasant enough case and screen. Although this phone is two years newer, it's slower with frequent pauses and stutters, camera / imaging no better, and sound isn't great. Sent back, and still using a z3 with a cracked screen - says it all really.
customer_reviews.author: SailingSailing96

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone light weight slim good speed even get a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone light weight slim good speed even get a SD card in it as well. good quilty pictures
customer_reviews.author: Vincent V.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: At this stage, I like the phone but even though I haven't added any apps or transferred my previous phone's content - I have literally have charged it up and the battery is running out like running water, 10% in 10 minutes whilst just on standby! I am hoping that once I have transferred my data and the software updates have all completed it will get better
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Superb.
customer_reviews.text: A great improvement over my previous clunky Nokia Windows phone, And I can now use more apps. I've finally seen the light!
customer_reviews.author: Fred P

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: hi , not the best phone , in the world , it dose not hold it charge very long , if it dose 6/8 hour on full battery your very looky , and that with very little use , i am very much thinking if sending it back !!
customer_reviews.author: wildlife time

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good budget smart phone, battery life is ok, good camera, clear screen, stylish in white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New phone
customer_reviews.text: New phone working great perfect condition thought arrived 2 days later than stated
customer_reviews.author: charlie byrne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely happy with the pics it makes. It works much faster than any android I had and very easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: ... always had Sony Xperia phone's and always found them better than iPhone's
customer_reviews.text: I have always had Sony Xperia phone's and always found them better than iPhone's
customer_reviews.author: Sharon morley

customer_reviews.title: so far good phone works well
customer_reviews.text: so far good phone works well, although if you leave wi-fi or data roaming on and play online games it wears the battery down quite quickly. over all i'm happy with the phone it meets my current needs
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Xperia
customer_reviews.text: Had an old xperia so was use to its operation. Pity it didn't come with headset.
customer_reviews.author: N. W. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Loved this phone, much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this phone, I used to have a Samsung but the battery died on me so I bought this as a cheap replacement, but I am a convert. Great quality and easy to use, battery life in amazing as well as the quality of the pictures. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Crap
customer_reviews.text: I'm done with Sony junk breaking after a couple of months, I want a refund. I'm getting rid of all Sony products I own...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its a phone and it works and it arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful battery
customer_reviews.text: Overall this phone is good, good camera etc. The reason for the 2 star is that the phone already started to lag after just 2 months of having it and the battery is ridiculously awful, it definitely won't last you 2 days like it states. You'll be lucky if it lasts a day. What's the point of a good phone if it don't last? I charged my phone fully and overnight the battery went down to 40 percent just because i received notifications from instagram, WhatsApp, snapchat etc. Would not recommend unless you want to carry a charger with you everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alicja

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this phone about four months ago very stylish all features working normally but it's battery let this model down, I only use checking my emails and other normal stuff no music or downloading, full battery last only five to six hours only. I don't know it's a charging or battery problem but I am not really satisfy with this Model and thinking it to replace with some other brand. I would not recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: A Raza

customer_reviews.title: Avoid Avoid Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my third Xperia XA from Amazon, when I make and receive calls, I chat for around ten seconds and then it just cuts out, I have taken it to my local phone shop, had it checked out it, is not a fault with the sim card or service, two more phones later and I am still having the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone I have bought in a while. I regret buying this due to the dreadful battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone I have bought in a while. I regret buying this due to the dreadful battery life. I wake up with 100% having charged this all night. Use the bluetooth for the commute, look at it a couple of times and it's 50% by lunchtime. The Sony Z3 Compact I owned before this was far far better....but I decided to replace with this as I dropped the old phone too many times.
customer_reviews.author: H R THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Camera is of an OK quality. Battery is absolutely terrible (barely lasting a few hours even when not used), the storage is SHOCKING and the phone screen damages without even dropping the phone (while in a case). Don't waste your money on this phone! Brought this phone in August and by Christmas I needed a new one. Had my last iPhone for over 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Pereira

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: would never buy a phone off here again didnt even last a month
customer_reviews.author: natalie
